senses.sense_definition: A person who lives in a particular place or a specific area.

examples.text: The local <w>residents</w> complained to the council about the noise from the construction site.
She has been a <w>resident</w> of this quiet neighborhood for over twenty years.

senses.sense_definition: A doctor who is receiving specialized training in a hospital after graduating from medical school.

examples.text: The senior <w>resident</w> supervised the interns during the complex surgical procedure.
After finishing medical school, he worked as a <w>resident</w> in the emergency department.

senses.sense_definition: A person who has the legal right to live permanently in a country but is not a citizen.

examples.text: He applied for status as a legal permanent <w>resident</w> to work in the country indefinitely.
The new law affects every foreign <w>resident</w> currently living in the state.

senses.sense_definition: A bird or animal that lives in the same place all year round and does not migrate.

examples.text: The robin is a common <w>resident</w> in many gardens throughout the winter months.
Unlike migratory species, this owl is a permanent <w>resident</w> of the northern forests.

senses.sense_definition: A diplomatic representative living in a foreign country, usually of lower rank than an ambassador.

examples.text: The government appointed a new <w>resident</w> to handle affairs in the colonial territory.
Historical records show that the British <w>resident</w> played a key role in local politics.

senses.sense_definition: Living or staying in a specific place for a continuous period.

examples.text: He is currently <w>resident</w> in France, although he maintains a business in London.
The <w>resident</w> population of the island swells significantly during the tourist season.

senses.sense_definition: Working regularly at a particular place or for a particular organization, often having special skills.

examples.text: She is the magazine's <w>resident</w> expert on fashion and writes a weekly column.
The hotel has a <w>resident</w> pianist who plays in the lobby every evening.

senses.sense_definition: Stored permanently in a computer's memory for immediate access.

examples.text: This antivirus software stays <w>resident</w> in memory to protect the system in real time.
The program includes a <w>resident</w> module that monitors all incoming network traffic.
